channel.title: 👳 The Monk & The Hedonist (Royal Social)
channel.description:
Another "guess someone else's class" class.
# [color=steblue]**The Monk**[/color] (Social) 🌄 **Ascending (Passive) -** If you survive to the end, your team wins even if 1 opponent remains.
👑 **Royal Blood (Passive)**
:eye: **Discern (Night) -** Earn a charge of [color=yellow]**Patience**[/color] by correctly identifying the exact class of a player who is either [color=purple]**Unseen**[/color], [color=red]**Cult**[/color], [color=gray]**Neutral Killer**[/color], **Fool**, **Scorned**, **Inquisitor**, or **Sellsword**.
🧘 **Meditate (Night) -** Become death immune by consuming a charge of [color=yellow]**Patience**[/color], if you have any.
*You will never be explicitly informed of how many [color=yellow]**Patience**[/color] charges you have. If you use **Meditate** but get attacked and have no [color=yellow]**Patience**[/color], you'll simply die.*
# [color=Purple]**The Hedonist**[/color] (Social)
👑 **Royal Blood (Passive)**
💊 **Chill Pill (Night) -** *The opposite of **Mind Warp***. Target an investigative to make them see everyone as "not suspicious" and "social or support" and "matching everyone".
🍭 **Dulcify (Day) -** Force someone to cast their vote as pardon.

item.title: 👳 The Monk & The Hedonist (Royal Social)
item.dc:creator: Intensify
item.description:
Shrimpy:

Ascending (Passive) - If you survive to the end, your team wins even if 1 opponent remains.

Does this make the opposite faction lose though?

item.title: 👳 The Monk & The Hedonist (Royal Social)
item.dc:creator: Conduit
item.description:
A bit lackluster. All you get is a small untold chance to be death immune. The “guess people’s class” classes are fine, just change the night ability to have more utility?

Read full topic

item.title: 👳 The Monk & The Hedonist (Royal Social)
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
Another “guess someone else’s class” class.

The Monk (Social)

Ascending (Passive) - If you survive to the end, your team wins even if 1 opponent remains.

Royal Blood (Passive)

Discern (Night) - Earn a charge of Patience by correctly identifying the exact class of a player who is either Unseen, Cult, Neutral Killer, Fool, Scorned, Inquisitor, or Sellsword.

Meditate (Night) - Become death immune by consuming a charge of Patience, if you have any.

You will never be explicitly informed of how many Patience charges you have. If you use Meditate but get attacked and have no Patience, you’ll simply die.

The Hedonist (Social)

Royal Blood (Passive)

Chill Pill (Night) - The opposite of Mind Warp. Target an investigative to make them see everyone as “not suspicious” and “social or support” and “matching everyone”.

Dulcify (Day) - Force someone to cast their vote as pardon.

Read full topic
